text: Ya Naa Yakubu (Yakuba) I was Ya-Na, or king, of the Kingdom of Dagbon in northern Ghana. He ruled between c. 1829 and c. 1849, however other sources put his reign roughly between c. 1799 and c. 1839. == See also == * List of rulers of the Northern state of Dagomba == References == Category:African royalty Category:African royalty stubs Category:Dagomba people Category:Dagbon Category:African kings
title: Yakubu I
